Name: One Life
About the game: One hit death bullet hell action featuring upgrades, unlockable abilities, minigames, hats and y̴͌ò̷͐ú̷̈́. - Movement Fluid movement and dashing, which can of course be upgraded. Your dodging skills will be tested. - Enemies Providing a constant stream of obstacles while getting smarter and gaining more attacks incrementally, still perfect for destroying. - Upgrades Plenty of upgrades and abilities to buy to try and match your enemies’ increasing difficulty. - Minigames and Cosmetics Purchase cosmetics for your square earned by completing levels and getting highscores in minigames. - Music Featuring an original Synthwave soundtrack by Makazi the Hyena. Who are you? Do you know how it all started? Who made you?
